title: Webscraper with GUI (website uses sessions, hides urls)
snippet:
We have a series of complex projects and are looking to bring on board our team a top data webscraper that has experience in:

*Extracting data from websites with difficult scraping countermeasures
*Websites that use cookies and session information
*Building a user friendly custom front end with multiple input fields
*Application must run on end users workstation and be fast, and efficiently coded.

Preferred experience with:
*Object Oriented Programming (Perl/Python/C#/VB/PHP)
*Web Scraping - Scrapy, Mechanize, Selenium, Curl, Python, Java, Perl
*Crawling , Data Mining, Data Extraction

The project is broken up into stages with each stage designed to scrape 1 section and then integrate the data from multiple scrapers into an excel spreadsheet.

Apply if you have extensive experience and able to take on challenging scraping scenarios.

Minimum requirement:
*100 hours
*4.8stars+
*Extensive coding experience
*Automation experience
*Can work independently and solve problems quickly
*Are responsive and available to start immediately

Total project value: $450

Stage 1: $150
Stage 2: $150
Stage 3: $150
